sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.YM /*일자*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*일반권_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO /*일반권_평일야간권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*일반권_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO /*일반권_주말야간권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_월정기권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*할인권(50%)_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(50%)_평일야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*할인권(50%)_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(50%)_주말야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(50%)_월정기권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*일반권_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM /*일반권_평일야간권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*일반권_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM /*일반권_주말야간권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_월정기권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*할인권(50%)_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(50%)_평일야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*할인권(50%)_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(50%)_주말야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(50%)_월정기권_금액*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_WKDAY_CO_SUM /*일반권_평일_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_WKDAY_AM_SUM /*일반권_평일_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_WKEND_CO_SUM /*일반권_주말_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_WKEND_AM_SUM /*일반권_주말_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_CO_SUM /*일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_AM_SUM /*일반권_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_CO_SUM /*할인권_평일_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_AM_SUM /*할인권_평일_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_CO_SUM /*할인권_주말_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_AM_SUM /*할인권_주말_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_CO_SUM /*할인권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_50_PT_AM_SUM /*할인권_건수_계*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS CO_SUM /*건수_총계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS AM_SUM /*금액_총계*/ FROM ( SELECT #YEAR# AS YEAR ,#YEAR#||LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) AS YM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 13 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TBHPM_CENTRALPARK_TNNCRT t2 ON t1.YM = t2.YM WHERE 1 =1 AND t1.YEAR = #YEAR# ORDER BY t1.YM
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBHPM_CENTRALPARK_TNNCRT SET GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO = #GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO# ,GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO = #GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO# ,GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO = #GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO# ,GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO = #GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO# ,GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO = #GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_CO# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_CO# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_CO# ,DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_CO = #DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_CO# ,GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM = #GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM# ,GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM = #GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM# ,GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM = #GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM# ,GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM = #GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM# ,GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM = #GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_GNRL_AM# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_GNRL_AM# ,DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM = #DSCNT_50_PT_WKEND_NIGHT_AM# ,DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_AM = #DSCNT_50_PT_MT_CMMTKT_AM# ,UPDUSR_ID = #S_USER_ID# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YM = #YM#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBHPM_CENTRALPARK_TNNCRT WHERE YM LIKE #YM# || '%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.YM /*일자*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*일반권_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO /*일반권_평일야간권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*일반권_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO /*일반권_주말야간권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_월정기권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*할인권(청소년)_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_평일야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*할인권(청소년)_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_주말야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_월정기권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말야간권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_월정기권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*일반권_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM /*일반권_평일야간권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*일반권_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM /*일반권_주말야간권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_월정기권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*할인권(청소년)_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_평일야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*할인권(청소년)_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_주말야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_월정기권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말야간권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_월정기권_금액*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_WKDAY_CO_SUM /*일반권_평일_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_WKEND_CO_SUM /*일반권_주말_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_WKDAY_AM_SUM /*일반권_평일_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_WKEND_AM_SUM /*일반권_주말_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_CO_SUM /*일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_AM_SUM /*일반권_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_평일_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_주말_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_평일_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_주말_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS CO_SUM /*건수_총계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS AM_SUM /*금액_총계*/ FROM ( SELECT #YEAR# AS YEAR ,#YEAR#||LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) AS YM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 13 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TBHPM_DOLMORU_TNNCRT_MANAGE t2 ON t1.YM = t2.YM WHERE 1 =1 AND t1.YEAR = #YEAR# ORDER BY t1.YM

,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_GNRL_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_GNRL_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_일반권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_GNRL_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_GNRL_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_일반권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS CO_SUM /*건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS AM_SUM /*금액_계*/ FROM ( SELECT #YEAR# AS YEAR ,#YEAR#||LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) AS YM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 13 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TBHPM_PARK_GLCRS_MANAGE t2 ON t1.YM = t2.YM WHERE 1 =1 AND t1.YEAR = #YEAR# ORDER BY t1.YM

sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.YM /*일자*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*일반권_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*일반권_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_정기권1개월_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_정기권3개월_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_정기권6개월_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_정기권12개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*할인권(청소년)_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*할인권(청소년)_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_정기권1개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_정기권3개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_정기권6개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_정기권12개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말일반권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권1개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권3개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권6개월_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권12개월_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*일반권_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*일반권_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_정기권1개월_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_정기권3개월_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_정기권6개월_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_정기권12개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*할인권(청소년)_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*할인권(청소년)_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권1개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권3개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권6개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권12개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_평일일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주말일반권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권1개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권3개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권6개월_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권12개월_금액*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) AS GNRL_GNRL_CO_SUM /*일반권_일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) AS GNRL_GNRL_AM_SUM /*일반권_일반권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_CMMTKT_CO_SUM /*일반권_정기권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_CMMTKT_AM_SUM /*일반권_정기권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_CO_SUM /*일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_AM_SUM /*일반권_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_GNRL_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_GNRL_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_일반권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_GNRL_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_GNRL_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_일반권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_금액_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS CO_SUM /*건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKDAY_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_WKEND_GNRL_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_1MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_3MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_6MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_12MONTH_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS AM_SUM /*금액_계*/ FROM ( SELECT #YEAR# AS YEAR ,#YEAR#||LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) AS YM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 13 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TBHPM_HYANGNAM_PARK_GLCRS t2 ON t1.YM = t2.YM WHERE 1 =1 AND t1.YEAR = #YEAR# ORDER BY t1.YM

sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBHPM_HYANGNAM_PARK_GLCRS WHERE YM LIKE #YM# || '%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t1.YM /*일자*/ ,t2.GNRL_DAYTM_CO /*일반권_주간_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_CO /*일반권_조/야간_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO /*일반권_정기권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_CO /*할인권(청소년)_주간_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_조/야간_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주간_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_조/야간_건수*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_건수*/ ,t2.GNRL_DAYTM_AM /*일반권_주간_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_AM /*일반권_조/야간_금액*/ ,t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM /*일반권_정기권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_AM /*할인권(청소년)_주간_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_조/야간_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(청소년)_정기권_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_주간_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_조/야간_금액*/ ,t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_정기권_금액*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS GNRL_CO_SUM /*일반권_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS GNRL_AM_SUM /*일반권_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_CO_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_YNGBGS_AM_SUM /*할인권(청소년)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_CO_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS DSCNT_ETC_AM_SUM /*할인권(경로,장애인,국가유공자)_금액_계*/
,NVL(t2.GNRL_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO, 0) +NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_CO, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO, 0) AS CO_SUM /*건수_계*/ ,NVL(t2.GNRL_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_AM, 0) + NVL(t2.DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM, 0) AS AM_SUM /*금액_계*/
FROM ( SELECT #YEAR# AS YEAR ,#YEAR#||LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) AS YM FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 13 ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TBHPM_ACHSTE_MANAGE t2 ON t1.YM = t2.YM WHERE 1 =1 AND t1.YEAR = #YEAR# ORDER BY t1.YM
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TBHPM_ACHSTE_MANAGE SET GNRL_DAYTM_CO = #GNRL_DAYTM_CO# ,GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_CO = #GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_CO# ,GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO = #GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_CO# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_CO = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_CO# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_CO = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_CO# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_CO# ,DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_CO = #DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_CO# ,DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_CO = #DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_CO# ,DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO = #DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_CO# ,GNRL_DAYTM_AM = #GNRL_DAYTM_AM# ,GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_AM = #GNRL_MORN_NIGHT_AM# ,GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM = #GNRL_MT_CMMTKT_AM# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_AM = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_DAYTM_AM# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_AM = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_MORN_NIGHT_AM# ,DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM = #DSCNT_YNGBGS_CMMTKT_AM# ,DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_AM = #DSCNT_ETC_DAYTM_AM# ,DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_AM = #DSCNT_ETC_MORN_NIGHT_AM# ,DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM = #DSCNT_ETC_CMMTKT_AM# ,UPDUSR_ID = #S_USER_ID# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE YM = #YM#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TBHPM_ACHSTE_MANAGE WHERE YM LIKE #YM# || '%'
